title: Gemini Custom Commands Format
description: JSON Schema for Gemini CLI custom commands (.toml format)

prompt.description: The instruction text sent to the Gemini model. Can span multiple lines and supports placeholders like {{args}}, !{...} for shell commands, and @{...} for file injection.

description.description: A brief, single-line explanation of the command's purpose. Appears in /help menu. If omitted, system generates a generic description from filename.

examples.prompt: Review the code for potential bugs and suggest improvements.

examples.description: Generate unit tests for the specified file
